Name: Fire Cape
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Torchic, Combusken, and Blaziken.  You can get a Fire Cape at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Torchic Hair, a Torchic Card, and a Hot Pebble. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
